attributes.action: Stop CRB abuse and discrimination against the rehabilitated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We teach people to learn from their mistakes; we give ourselves a second chance if we fail at something. Should we not extend the same to genuinely rehabilitated people? 
Should criminal records not only reflect unspent convictions, especially in cases when people have genuinely turned their lives around?
Safeguards can be put in place that are proactive - preventative, not unecessarily retroactive. It is the occurrence of present and future abuse that we must protect against, and most people had clean records before they abused someone. 
The extent to which we have been barring people is now ridiculous, and MUST stop.
